column1: Little Goat Diner////Came here for a quick bite at around 9:30am on a rainy Saturday and the wait was only about 20-25 minutes for 2 people. Ordered the This Little Piggy Went to China sandwich and one of the cinnamon buns. The Little Piggy sandwich was PERFECTION. Well balanced flavors
column3: nicely toasted scallion biscuit. The cinnamon bun left a lot to be desired. It arrived warm
column4: but was pretty dry. Maybe we got a bad one...I'd be willing to try it again.
